html:
12.20.20  1:56 pm   Is there any clue about the new video?

      yes

12.20.20  1:21 pm   when will there be a trailer for the new song if there is one

      you're going to see some artifacts on instagram

12.20.20  12:00 pm   After the video you're working on finishing for the completed song is done and posted online, do you know what you want to do next?

     another one

      (performing live on stage, more songs with videos, anagrams, reality videos)

     all of those things also

12.20.20  11:46 am   are you working on a new song?

      i am working on the video for it

12.20.20  11:16 am   do you support lgbtq people?

      yes, this is part of an even broader strategy i have of supporting the entire universe. nay sayers will advise that the universe is too big for me to support it, but i am looking into some interesting leverage tactics

12.20.20  11:13 am   what is your new years resolution

      to do a great job on questions today

12.20.20  10:23 am   Honest opinion on humanity

      very friendly

12.20.20  9:10 am   Do you feel that the musical video that you're currently working on is your best work yet? 

      in some ways yes. in other ways no

12.20.20  9:02 am   What would you personally say the best video or song you've ever made is? 

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

12.20.20  8:15 am   what file size is the project file for your new video?

      it's not all in one file yet

12.20.20  7:49 am   what is the most exciting part about making a song

      possibly changing the world

12.20.20  6:19 am   whats the 0th word of your new song
please dont kill me

      a sort of snare drum riff

12.20.20  5:05 am   how did you develop your editing style?

      that's simple. just take out all the stuff that wasn't good enough

12.20.20  4:43 am   can you make a song about me?

      sure

12.20.20  3:11 am   what are some good three letter names?

      mat, hat,

12.20.20  2:01 am   where do you get inspiration for your songs?

      from every location

12.20.20  1:10 am   what's the genre of your new song

      normal

12.20.20  12:52 am   Hey Mr. Wirtz, whatever your next project is, does it have to do with a YouTube video, or your YouTube channel at all?

     sure, it's a song with a music video, which i always post on my youtube channel, and website, and also release to popular music platforms (spotify, apple, etc)

     When/ Where can we see your next big project?

     all of those places, but, i should clarify, this upcoming song/video is of average size. however, there will be zillions more after it

12.19.20  11:36 pm   do you have any motivational words?

      you can use the 5 finger test. start checking out some of the words i have used, and see if they motivate you

12.19.20  10:28 pm   Advice for when music won't flow properly? like i'll play a piece I know sūper well but it just doesn't sound right, or robotic or clunky. How do you work through/around this??

      you have to believe you made it up. not only that, but you have to also believe you are making it up, at the moment you are playing it. you have to believe you are improvising it. if your playing sounds scripted, try improvising for a while. Then go back to the scripted piece and imagine you are playing it for someone who has never heard it before. think of a specific person in mind

12.19.20  9:14 pm   What is your opinion on the secularization or Christmas

      seems legit

12.19.20  8:42 pm   through what process did you gain your eccentric, esoteric wisdom / worldview and what can i do to accomplish the same? 

      picture a tree in a field,

12.19.20  7:43 pm   do humans typically have a brain defect that makes them try and classify things that plainly cannot be classified

      the whole universe is a defect. before the defect it was imperceptible

12.19.20  7:43 pm   Are you planning on making a Christmas album?

      that sounds like something i would do, but there are a lot of other things i am doing first

12.19.20  6:24 pm   what is it about albums that you'd rather have single songs

      as a song consumer, if i try to consume more than one (NEW) song at a time, i usually hate them all. but, if you present me with only 1 song, ....... it's always a hit

12.19.20  6:18 pm   how do you get music from your head to the world

      one weird trick is to combine it with something non-musical. music is non-music's best friend

12.19.20  5:21 pm   do you think i can make songs even if i have virtually zero knowledge about music?

     you have already hinted at some very crucial knowledge about music. you have indicated that you are aware that a song is a piece of music

     i was told i write good things but sadly, i don't know anything about music but i want to make songs too

     if you don't know anything about music then how do you even know you like it

12.19.20  4:09 pm   why do you only write in lowercaps

     i don't, but, why do YOU

      and never use full stop on the last sentence?

     not necessary. it's very obvious when the last sentence is over, because there's no more words

12.19.20  3:35 pm   How are you doing mentally?

      i am aspire to be world mental champion

12.19.20  3:05 pm   do you think the universe is flexible and can always be something else?

     yes

     like our current understandings of physics and religions suddenly being flipped by one small discovery?

      it can be many things simultaneously. our understanding can be even more things

12.19.20  2:50 pm   whats the hardest part of making a song

      remembering how easy it is

12.19.20  1:23 pm   Will your next video be in a similar style as your previous or do you plan on a completely different style

      you will most surely recognize me

12.19.20  12:25 pm   what do you think is the coolest thing about living on earth right now?

      just how frickin.... round it is

12.19.20  12:24 pm   Favorite brass instrument?

      trumpet

12.19.20  11:38 am   What's the last word of your new song?

      it

12.19.20  8:15 am   what would you say to help people be courageous enough to post creative stuff online

      HURRY UP unless you don't want to, then don't

12.19.20  7:03 am   besides from working on your current music project, do you have any other projects that you will be working on?

      yes

12.19.20  6:44 am   What are the inspirations behind your videos?

      anything i've ever known, seen, heard, or imagined

12.19.20  5:07 am   what is your thought process when editing a video,

     threatening myself with the possibility of skipping the video and just doing audio songs. just to keep things in perspective when i can't see the light at the end of the tunnel

     there's  something about its style or something that I love.

12.19.20  4:37 am   bill do you make songs intended to be funny

     funnyness is an important tool to use sometimes, but possibly not the most important tool

      or to be actually good?

     yes they are supposed to be good

     because your song "la de da de day dah" or smt is just AWSOME its even in my favorites playlist 

      ah, things are going according to plan

12.19.20  3:59 am   I'm not a music guy, but I'm curious as to those who are but when you hear music in your head, do you know how to write it down in music notation?

      yes

12.19.20  2:26 am   What is the 32nd word of your new song?

      and

12.19.20  1:19 am   aside from breakfast and strength tests, as mentioned in "i'm best friends with my own front door", were there any other things that were thrown (e.g. hot air balloons, syringes, chickens, etc.)

      you'll have to listen and see

12.19.20  12:41 am   What gives you the motivation to continue through and willing to produce something? Especially in these hard times that we (everyone in the world) have been going thru.

      if i think i've thought of something that can change the world

12.18.20  11:50 pm   What problem took you the longest to overcome when making your songs.

      figuring out what the heck is a song

12.18.20  9:46 pm   Did you get the idea for "At the Airport Terminal" in an Airport Terminal?

      no

12.18.20  8:15 pm   In the conversation between Jim and Pat in What Is Love?, if someone were infact to replace Pat with Bob at your suggestion, would Bob said that he does like mice? Also, are they discussing computer mice or rodent mice?

      what they are doing is testing the language, and the conversational process

12.18.20  7:07 pm   Why are you so awsome

      i'm just trying to get by

12.18.20  6:18 pm   are u a good person

      yes but i can be even better. one day i hope to be world champion person

12.18.20  4:32 pm   12.17.20 12:45 pm Does your new song contain pieces of "355. 4.2.12 dream idea"?

      no
